derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: from Latin absorbent- 'swallowing up', from the verb absorbere (see absorb)

entry.def: Absorbent material soaks up liquid easily.

means.word_mean: 1. a material having capacity or tendency to absorb another substance
1. having power or capacity or tendency to absorb or soak up (liquids);

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"……的"; 2. 表名词,通常表示"……人",也可以表示其他具体物.; 3. 表名词,"……药剂"

sil+ent……的→adj.寂静的,沉默的,无声的
